title: MY TERRIBLE SLEEPOVER
body:
One night i went to my friend's (we will refer to him as Jimmy) house for a sleepover and let me tell you it was not a good experience.

So me and my friend played games till midnight then finally planned to sleep.This was the beginning of a terrible night.

So I and some other friends slept on the floor while Jimmy slept on the bed.It was going quite and peaceful until at 3:00 A.M I was woken up by my sheet being pulled off.I woke up another friend (james) and told him what happened.We both got up grabbed some flashlights when we heard a huge crash in the kitchen that woke everyone up.We all were terrified.We went to investigate when we heard screams of terror coming from outside.

"WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS!"

Those type of screams.Then we heard a loud screeching noise from upstairs that shooked us all. I froze with chills running down my spine as I felt like I was being watched.I was to scared to tell anyone about it.My friend James came running and dashing towards me and the others while shouting

"THERE'S A MAN UPSTAIRS HIDE!

Some hid in a closet and some in the bathroom. We called the police but suddenly there was no service. As we were hiding a sinister voice while moaning said,"Do you need help if you do come out and i will help you!"

We all knew that it was the man/ghost James was talking about.I started to get goosebumps and almost started crying.

While we were hiding my friend's cat started shouting "MEAOW MEAOW MEAOW!" As if it was getting beaten by something. My friend swore this had never happened before to him.

Suddenly when it reached 4 AM it stopped everything stopped.The service on our phones was back,there were no sounds at all.We all thought we were fine but this was only the beginning.When the service came i looked up history about the house.It turns out 5 people were murdered there (who had unfinished business)on Semptember 12 1990.

Guess what day it was September 12th 2017.My jaw instantly dropped and when i showed it to Jimmy he said,"So that's why my mom told me not to go to the attic."

I instantly asked "Where's the attic?"

Jimmy replied in a sad voice,"In the closet upstairs."We all instantly went upstairs and looked there.What we saw will scar me for life.

It was a man who's face was completely fucked and twisted.He had no chin and no feet.And remember it was in the attic where I saw him.I screamed at the top of my lungs as he vanished in thin air.We called the police.The police was gonna be there in 30 minutes.

Soon blood started to drip from walls.Right after that we heard probably the worst scream of a girl coming from the attic.Soon the police arrived and they found two dead bodies in the attic both were 2 girls

One thing I can tell you that what's in the attic is not Human.
author: AsmarYT
